scripts.makemigrations: docker compose run web python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.migrate: docker compose run web python manage.py migrate
scripts.stage: git checkout staging && git pull origin staging && git push origin staging && git push github staging
scripts.golive: git checkout staging && git pull origin staging && git checkout master && git merge staging && git push origin master && git push github master && git checkout dev && git merge master && git push origin dev
scripts.sync-all: npm run stage && npm run golive
